'''XLOC''' is a provider of global localization solutions for the international computer and [[video game]] industry. <ref>http://www.xloc.com/Corporate/Default.aspx</ref>XLOC was founded in 2000 by <ref>http://www.mobygames.com/developer/sheet/view/developerId,7563/</ref>Stephanie OâMalley Deming and <ref>http://www.mobygames.com/developer/sheet/view/developerId,1226/</ref>Mason Deming, two industry veterans with previous experiance in [[game localization]] at [[Activision]], [[Electronic Arts]], [[LucasArts]], [[Capcom]] and [[2K Games]]. <br><Br>
